TopicTitle: Squad official mod idea: The Barn Returns!

Articles.Content:
I just saw that old video by RoninPawn about the Barn, and for the first time I saw the pictures of it, and I must say I like it, very Kerbal, good for a Caveman Challenge and all that.

But since Squad will never be able to fully put it in KSP (the community will go bonkers) I suggest for Squad to make an official mod, that replaces the Tier 1 KSC with the whole 'Barn KSC', so people who like the look of the barn can have the barn, and people who don't can still have their normal KSC.

Everyone wins!

And it would be rather easy for Squad to do, as it seems they have all the textures (and hopefully collision meshes and destruction animations) done, all they have to do is a bit of tweaking and file stuff, put it in a .zip file and whullah!

Thoughts?

Yeah I'm into that. People got so weird about the barn, no one seemed to get that they were seeing preliminary concept art. I thought it was inspired and added such a rich and creative flavor to the game... Oh well I suppose. There were polls at the time and a clear majority wanted them to finish the art and keep it so I think they should just go for it but if the hyper-bland teir one they have now makes people happy then I'd be fine with An official mod.

People got so weird about the barn, no one seemed to get that they were seeing preliminary concept art.
People got weird about the barn not because of the barn but because of the wealth of stereotypical redneck iconography that accompanied it. The last thing this game needs is a reinforcement of it as a disaster simulator; the community does enough harm in that respect as it is. Even if it was concept art it was a terrible concept.

Barn? Fine. Rusted car lot? Why the hell is that in the game?

the issue with the "barn" was the extremely low quality. textures were bad, models were bad, idea was poorly realized and theme was... off.

mod? fine, just don't put it in my game.
I don't think it should be a mod. It needs to be in-game.

Alshain, the reason I made this suggestion is to avoid people fighting and to let everyone be happy, by having the whole thing be OPTIONAL.

I personally like the textures.

Alshain, the reason I made this suggestion is to avoid people fighting and to let everyone be happy, by having the whole thing be OPTIONAL.

I personally like the textures.

Optional wouldn't make me happy though. There is no way to have it optional and an integral part of the game at the same time.
Optional wouldn't make me happy though. There is no way to have it optional and an integral part of the game at the same time.

I just want moddable building art period.

It's the only way this will be resolved peacefully.
So we agree! The other side is stupid and awful and an official mod is the way to go!

So we agree! The other side is stupid and awful and an official mod is the way to go!

well when you put it that way VIVA LA BARN! Make those picky ungrateful realism users pay for daring to impose their sense of realism on squads creative vision! Make all the tiers barns! each more scrappy and junky than the last!

Protip: be careful with the name calling if you want people on your side
There was a bit of parody in that post. Apologies if it was too subtle.

The plan is for the barn to be reworked and included in a future version of stock. Therefore, there is no need for a mod for this purpose.

Let's not repeat the barn hate yet again, please? It was a year ago. Let it go.
